summary: Travis Pastrana and his tight-knit, highly-skilled, adrenaline-addicted friends bring their impossible, ridiculous, insane and hysterical adventures to the big screen for the first time.
cast: Travis Pastrana|Jolene Van Vugt|Tommy Passemante|Jim DeChamp|Greg Powell|Erik Roner|Jeremy Rawle|Gregg Godfrey|Aaron Sauvage|Aaron Fotheringham|Parks Bonifay|Dusty Wygle|Cameron McQueen|Hubert Rowland|Channing Tatum|Rob Dyrdek|Ryan Sheckler|Johnny Knoxville|Ken Block|Bill Gerber|David Brooks|Dick Godfrey|Bob Burnquist|Dov Ribnick|Jeff Tremaine
title: Nitro Circus: The Movie
